properties.name: Arenal Volcano
properties.description: Iconic cone-shaped volcano with surrounding hot springs and rainforest

properties.name: Monteverde Cloud Forest
properties.description: Biodiversity hotspot with 400 bird species, famous for ziplining and canopy tours

properties.name: Corcovado National Park
properties.description: Most biologically intense place on Earth according to National Geographic

properties.name: Manuel Antonio National Park
properties.description: White sand beaches and rainforest meeting at high tide line on Pacific coast

properties.name: Tortuguero National Park
properties.description: Amazon of Central America accessible only by boat, famous for sea turtle nesting
